alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 01 at 7:18AM HST until June 02 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY FOR BIG ISLAND SUMMITS... .Strong winds are expected across the Big Island summits through Friday afternoon as the subtropical jetstream strengthens across the eastern islands. This advisory may need to be extended into the weekend as conditions warrant. ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST FRIDAY... * WHAT...West to northwest winds 30 to 50 mph with localized gusts to 65 mph. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking difficult. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Consider postponing travel to the summits until conditions improve. If you must travel to the summits, use extra caution walking and driving. Be careful opening or closing doors.
